languages.text: {n}Они жмутся по углам, устыдившиеся собственной податливости. Кровь, пролитая ими по глупости, служит им оправданием в собственных глазах, но... Они знают, что этого мало.{/n}
{n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Они жмутся по углам, устыдившиеся собственной податливости. Кровь, пролитая ими по глупости, служит им оправданием в собственных глазах, но... Они знают, что этого мало.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}They huddle in corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They convince themselves the blood they have foolishly spilled has atoned them, but... They know it is not enough.{/n}

{n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie kauern sich in den Ecken zusammen und schämen sich ihrer eigenen Unterwürfigkeit. Sie wollten sich selbst überzeugen, dass das von ihnen so dumm vergossene Blut ihnen Absolution bringen würde, aber ... sie wissen, dass das nicht ausreicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie kauern sich in den Ecken zusammen und schämen sich ihrer eigenen Unterwürfigkeit. Sie wollten sich selbst überzeugen, dass das von ihnen so dumm vergossene Blut ihnen Absolution bringen würde, aber ... sie wissen, dass das nicht ausreicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se agazapan en las esquinas, avergonzados por su sumisión. Intentaron convencerse de que la sangre que derramaron innecesariamente les absolvería, pero... saben que no es suficiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se agazapan en las esquinas, avergonzados por su sumisión. Intentaron convencerse de que la sangre que derramaron innecesariamente les absolvería, pero... saben que no es suficiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らは隅の方に身を寄せ合い、服従するしかない自分自身を恥じている。愚かにも流した血が自分たちを赦すのだと何とか自分を納得させようとしたが…その材料だけでは不十分だと悟っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らは隅の方に身を寄せ合い、服従するしかない自分自身を恥じている。愚かにも流した血が自分たちを赦すのだと何とか自分を納得させようとしたが…その材料だけでは不十分だと悟っていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有人都蜷缩在角落里，为他们自己的恶行感到羞愧。他们试图说服自己，试图相信他们鲁莽洒下的鲜血足以让他们得到赦免，然而……他们明白，这样是不够的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人都蜷缩在角落里，为他们自己的恶行感到羞愧。他们试图说服自己，试图相信他们鲁莽洒下的鲜血足以让他们得到赦免，然而……他们明白，这样是不够的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ils se recroquevillent dans les coins, honteux de leur propre soumission, et cherchent à se convaincre qu'ils seront absous par le sang si imprudemment versé... en sachant que cela ne suffira pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ils se recroquevillent dans les coins, honteux de leur propre soumission, et cherchent à se convaincre qu'ils seront absous par le sang si imprudemment versé... en sachant que cela ne suffira pas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kendi itaatkârlıklarından utanır hâlde köşelerde toplanıyorlar. Ahmakça döktükleri tüm o kanın günahlarından arınmalarını sağlayacağına dair kendilerini ikna etmeye çalışıyorlar ama... Bunun yeterli olmayacağını biliyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They huddle in the corners, ashamed of their own subservience. They tried to convince themselves that the blood they so foolishly spilt would absolve them, but... they know it is not enough.{/n}
